input.prompt: Complete logging for i-phase-1-multi-platform-integration task. This task implemented the complete Phase 1 multi-platform coordination system with Advanced Task Router, Cross-Platform Memory System, Synthetic.new integration (3 specialized agents), Claude Code slash commands, and production deployment configuration. All success criteria met: 40% cost reduction achieved through intelligent routing, multi-platform coordination operational, and system ready for production testing. Status should be completed.
